families.name: Access Control
families.description: Controls for managing access to systems and information, including account management, access enforcement, and remote access.

families.name: Awareness and Training
families.description: Controls for security awareness and training programs to ensure personnel understand security responsibilities.

families.name: Audit and Accountability
families.description: Controls for audit logging, monitoring, and maintaining accountability for system activities.

families.name: Assessment, Authorization, and Monitoring
families.description: Controls for security assessments, authorization processes, and continuous monitoring.

families.name: Configuration Management
families.description: Controls for managing system configurations, baselines, and change control processes.

families.name: Contingency Planning
families.description: Controls for business continuity, disaster recovery, and system backup procedures.

families.name: Identification and Authentication
families.description: Controls for identifying and authenticating users, devices, and services.

families.name: Incident Response
families.description: Controls for incident handling, reporting, and response capabilities.

families.name: Maintenance
families.description: Controls for system maintenance, including local and remote maintenance procedures.

families.name: Media Protection
families.description: Controls for protecting digital and physical media containing sensitive information.

families.name: Physical and Environmental Protection
families.description: Controls for physical access, environmental hazards, and facility security.

families.name: Planning
families.description: Controls for security planning, system security plans, and rules of behavior.

families.name: Program Management
families.description: Controls for organization-wide information security program management.

families.name: Personnel Security
families.description: Controls for personnel screening, termination, and transfer procedures.

families.name: Personally Identifiable Information Processing and Transparency
families.description: Controls for handling PII, consent, privacy notices, and data minimization.

families.name: Risk Assessment
families.description: Controls for risk assessment, vulnerability scanning, and threat intelligence.

families.name: System and Services Acquisition
families.description: Controls for secure development, acquisition, and supply chain risk management.

families.name: System and Communications Protection
families.description: Controls for protecting communications, cryptography, and system boundaries.

families.name: System and Information Integrity
families.description: Controls for malware protection, security alerts, and software integrity.

families.name: Supply Chain Risk Management
families.description: Controls for managing supply chain risks, component authenticity, and provenance.
